item.name: Right Main Wheel
item.value: CHECK BRAKES FOR LEAKING BRAKE FLUID

item.name: Left Main Wheel
item.value: CHECK BRAKES FOR LEAKING BRAKE FLUID

item.name: Preflight Inspection
item.value: Use the walker view to inspect the aircraft externally

item.name: Ignition Switch
item.value: (press s and hold until the engine starts)

item.name: Transponder
item.value: (As requested from ATC or 1200 in USA, 7000 rest of the world)

item.name: Power
item.value: REDUCE to idle after clearing obstacle

item.name: Wing Flaps
item.value: RETRACT (after reaching safe altitude and 60 KIAS)

item.name: Magnetos/Ignition
item.value: BOTH (or START if prop is stopped)
